review: The best money I have spent in years.We have an older TV and I am pretty technologically stupid.  Hate trying to figure out DVDs, etc.Amazon Fire.  OH MY GOSH.  So easy.  My 8 year old mastered it before I did.We watch tons of Netflix (also a good deal) and I hated not being able to watch it on our television.  Some of our favorite things to do -Netflix for movies and Animal Planet/Nat Geo/Survival shows.  Hulu for old TV shows (my teen is a big fan of Woody Harrelson - it has been so fun to introduce her to Cheers!) Amazon streaming for renting new movies AND for free exercise shows.THANK YOU AMAZON!
